categories: Category:Ships of the Open Circle Fleet

nodes.text: The Guarlara was a Venator-class Star Destroyer that participated in the Battle of Coruscant. During the battle, it confronted the Separatist flagship Invisible Hand and exchanged broadside fire, taking heavy damage to its starboard side but dealing a crippling blow to the Separatist dreadnought by striking its gun magazine. It shared its name with a creature indigenous to the grasslands of Naboo.
During the Battle of Coruscant, members of the 41st Elite Corps were stationed aboard the vessel and participated in the broadside exchange.
